Class com.google.api.client.json.JsonFactory

Added Methods
T fromInputStream(InputStream, Class<T>) Parse and close an input stream as a JSON object, array, or value into a new instance of the given destination class using JsonParser.parseAndClose(Class, CustomizeJsonParser).
T fromReader(Reader, Class<T>) Parse and close a reader as a JSON object, array, or value into a new instance of the given destination class using JsonParser.parseAndClose(Class, CustomizeJsonParser).
byte[] toByteArray(Object) Returns a UTF-8 encoded byte array of the serialized JSON representation for the given item using JsonGenerator.serialize(Object).
 

Changed Methods
String toPrettyString(Object) Documentation changed from old to new.
 Returns a pretty-printed serialized JSON string representation for the given item using JsonGenerator.serialize(Object) with JsonGenerator.enablePrettyPrint().
